channel.title: Please help, anyone. Desperate need of help. (667)
channel.description: Ok I have my 667 server all to my wantings but I have one problem, I need a shop that the players can sell item's too and get gold in return? example : Player sells a firecape , gets 7M cash back? thanks if anyone could help!
